name: Matt's Birthday 2018
description:
This is a quick game I made for my brother's birthday (one day late).

It's pretty simple and extremely unbalanced, but I think it served its purpose well.

Arrow keys and WASD move Matt around, the mouse aims and fires. 1-5 on the keyboard will choose different weapons.  Right click on the mouse for Derpy Matt Mode.

Credits:

  • Night of the Living Dead for the zombie
  • Duke Nukem 3D for the weapon sprites
  • Metal Slug for the explosions
  • My brother Matt for his face

Want to support my free games?  I sell merchandise featuring characters and designs from some of my most well received games. Every purchase helps me to not starve on my way to releasing my next game!
